name: MENACING MINER
description:
Click on the drill to start!

W and S to climb up and down the ladder.

A and D to dash left and right to collect gas for your drill and kill enemies.

I was going to include a shop to upgrade things, but I ran out of time :(

All assets are made for this game by Divagated (except for the font, which was made by Divagated, but not for this game)

Made for Ludum Dare 48
